body_html: Aren't CUDA kernel launches async? I'm not sure how this actually solves the race condition, if the kernel executes asynchronously after you release the lock. How are we testing this change?
body_text: Aren't CUDA kernel launches async? I'm not sure how this actually solves the race condition, if the kernel executes asynchronously after you release the lock. How are we testing this change?
body: Aren't CUDA kernel launches async? I'm not sure how this actually solves the race condition, if the kernel executes asynchronously after you release the lock. How are we testing this change?
